scripts.kill:docker: docker stop centreon-dev && docker rm centreon-dev
scripts.cypress:run:develop: pnpm start:docker && cypress run --config-file cypress.dev.config.ts --browser=chrome --e2e && pnpm kill:docker
scripts.cypress:run:develop:debug: pnpm start:docker && DEBUG=cypress:* cypress run --config-file cypress.dev.json --browser=chrome 2> ./cypress/results/logs.txt && pnpm kill:docker
scripts.cypress:open:dev: pnpm start:docker && cypress open --config-file cypress.dev.config.ts --browser=chrome --e2e && pnpm kill:docker
